# wormly_scheduled_downtime_period (Resource)

Wormly scheduled downtime period resource



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `end` (String) The ending time of the period in HH:mm format (24-hour clock)
- `hostid` (Number) The ID of the host to schedule downtime for
- `recurrence` (String) The recurrence pattern. Must be one of ONCEONLY, DAILY, WEEKLY, or MONTHLY
- `start` (String) The starting time of the period in HH:mm format (24-hour clock)
- `timezone` (String) The POSIX standard timezone of the start and end times (e.g., 'GMT', 'Europe/London')

### Optional

- `on` (String) The specific day for the downtime. For ONCEONLY recurrence, this is a date in YYYY-MM-DD format. For WEEKLY recurrence, this is the day of the week (e.g., 'Sunday'). For MONTHLY recurrence, this is the day of the month (1-31 or 'LASTDAY'). This argument should be omitted for DAILY recurrence.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Scheduled downtime period identifier
